    Harvard College Fellowship

    During my Harvard College Fellowship, I taught:

    • MCB 135. Introductory Systems Biology (materials in git repo)
    • LS 50ab and LS 200. Integrated Life Sciences (external website with course info), for which I received the Harvard University Certificate of Teaching Excellence in 2016.
